text: Ezɨ Ikiavɨra Itir God, Atrivim Amasian arazir kamɨn ganigha bar a baseme. Egha Ikiavɨra Itir God uan akam inigha izir gumazim amadazɨma, a ghua kamaghɨn Amasia mɨgei, “Nɨ tizim bagha ikɨzir igharazimɨn asebar ziaba fe? Nɨ fo, aser kaba uan adarazir akuragha nɨn dafarimɨn ua me inizir puvatɨ. Ezɨ, nɨ tizim bagha dar ziaba fe?”
